name: Крем-уход для волос Garnier Fructis SOS спасатель волос 10в1 для поврежденных волос 400мл
ingredients: AQUA/WATER, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, COCOS NUCIFERA OIL / COCONUT OIL, CETYL ALCOHOL, CETYL ESTERS, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM EXTRACT / SUGARCANE EXTRACT, CAMELLIA SINESIS LEAF EXTRACT, PHYLLANYHUS EMBLICA FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS LIMON PEEL EXTRACT / LEMON PEEL EXTRACT, PYRUS MALUS FRUIT EXTRACT, DILAURYL THIODIPROPIONATE, NACINAMIDE, LEUCONOSTOC/RADDISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, TRIDECETH-6, CMODIMETHICONE, BEHENTRIMONIJUM METHOSULFATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PYRIDOXINE HCI, HYDROLYZED CORN PROTEIN, HYDROLYZED SOY PROTEIN, HYDROLYZED VEGETABLE PROTEIN PG-PROPYL, SILANETRIOL, HYDROLYZED WHEAT PROTEIN, HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM LEMON PROTEIN, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CITRIC ACID, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SALICYLIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, CETRIMONIUM CHLORIDE CI 15985 / YELLOW 6, CI 19140 / YELLOW 5, LINALOOL, AMYL CINNAMAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE (F.I.L C229068/1).
